title: Classroom Projector Not Working
description: A professor calls from a classroom 10 minutes before class starts because the projector is not turning on.

tasks.description: Identify the professor and the classroom number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the exact location of the issue.

tasks.description: Attempt a remote restart of the classroom's A/V system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses the remote management tool to power cycle the projector.

tasks.description: If the remote restart fails, dispatch an on-site technician immediately.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a high-priority ticket and dispatches the nearest technician.
